2024 年 6 月 18 日星期二 02:20:26 +0000 TED 每日演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks TED - TED.com TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 TED 会议上值得传播的想法泰德TED 是一个致力于传播值得传播的想法的非营利组织。在此视频中，您将看到一些世界领先的思想家和实干家在 TED 会议、TEDx 活动和世界各地合作伙伴活动的舞台上发表演讲，激发、激发和激发他们的想象力。该播客还提供高清视频和纯音频格式。 zh知识共享：https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-nd/4.0/泰德contact@ted.com https://pl.tedcdn.com/rss_feed_images/ted_talks_main_podcast/video.png TED 每日演讲（标清视频） https://www.ted.com/talks 144 144 科学技术娱乐设计 TED、TEDTalks、TED 演讲、灵感、创造力、技术演示、教育不非成人的
如何识别威权主义并选择民主|伊恩·巴辛伊恩·巴辛Democracy is about having choices — and authoritarianism is about not having them, says lawyer and writer Ian Bassin. Detailing the seven steps of the authoritarian playbook, he invites us all to put aside our differences and rethink our role in the fight for freedom, revealing the hope and power behind every choice we make.如何识别威权主义并选择民主|伊恩·巴辛Democracy is about having choices — and authoritarianism is about not having them, says lawyer and writer Ian Bassin. Detailing the seven steps of the authoritarian playbook, he invites us all to put aside our differences and rethink our role in the fight for freedom, revealing the hope and power behind every choice we make. https://www.ted.com/talks/ian_bassin_how_to_spot_authoritarianism_and_choose_democracy?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:126805 126805 Mon, 17 Jun 2024 14:40:48 +0000高等教育不00:16:18泰德
主厨对美食、文化和社区的看法 |马库斯·萨缪尔森马库斯·萨缪尔森The secret magic of good food is that it brings people and cultures closer together. Chef Marcus Samuelsson taps into that magic at his acclaimed restaurants and through his cross-cultural approach to cooking. In conversation with art curator Thelma Golden, he expands on the rich fusion of modern Black cuisine and how each bite is a celebration of the diverse, creative and joyful power of food. (Visit ted.com/membership to support TED today and join more exclusive events like this one.)主厨对美食、文化和社区的看法 |马库斯·萨缪尔森The secret magic of good food is that it brings people and cultures closer together. 为什么你应该谈论你在工作中的焦虑|亚当·怀布鲁亚当·怀布鲁We can't get rid of anxiety and depression, so we might as well talk about it, says depression truth-teller Adam Whybrew. 为什么AI需要“营养标签” |卡西娅·赫米林斯基卡西娅·赫米林斯基What do sandwiches have to do with AI? Data reformist Kasia Chmielinski helps us think about artificial intelligence with a useful food metaphor — and breaks down why AI systems should have "nutrition labels" to ensure the development of fairer, more transparent algorithms.为什么AI需要“营养标签” |卡西娅·赫米林斯基What do sandwiches have to do with AI? 娱乐业正在经历人工智能升级|凯兰·吉布斯凯兰·吉布斯AI has the power to bring your favorite fictional characters to life, says technologist Kylan Gibbs. Introducing Caleb, an "AI agent" with personality and internal reasoning, he demonstrates how AI-powered characters can interact with people in novel ways, generate unique video game outcomes and augment our ability to tell stories, opening up new worlds of possibility.娱乐业正在经历人工智能升级|凯兰·吉布斯AI has the power to bring your favorite fictional characters to life, says technologist Kylan Gibbs. 即使是健康的夫妻也会吵架——区别在于如何吵架朱莉和约翰·戈特曼朱莉和约翰·戈特曼Can conflict actually bring you and your partner closer? It depends on how you fight, say Julie and John Gottman, the world's leading relationship scientists. They share why the way couples fight can predict the future of their relationships — and show how anybody can transform conflict into an opportunity for deeper connection and understanding.即使是健康的夫妻也会吵架——区别在于如何吵架朱莉和约翰·戈特曼Can conflict actually bring you and your partner closer? DEI 出了什么问题——以及如何做对 |保罗·高迪亚诺保罗·高迪亚诺Social entrepreneur Paolo Gaudiano explains why many companies are taking the wrong approach to diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) initiatives — by overly focusing on one thing. To avoid backlash and costly turnover, he shows the key change leaders can make to create thriving, equitable workplaces while also increasing profits. DEI 出了什么问题——以及如何做对 |保罗·高迪亚诺Social entrepreneur Paolo Gaudiano explains why many companies are taking the wrong approach to diversity, equity and inclusion (DEI) initiatives — by overly focusing on one thing. 为什么破碎的心会受伤——什么可以治愈它们？约拉姆·约维尔约拉姆·约维尔What's the relationship between physical and mental pain, and how can you ease both? Revealing how your experiences of love, loss and pain are deeply intertwined, neuroscientist Yoram Yovell sheds light on the surprising role of your brain's endorphins and opioid receptors to ease physical and emotional suffering — and shows how this connection could pave the way to new treatments for mental health and well-being.为什么破碎的心会受伤——什么可以治愈它们？约拉姆·约维尔What's the relationship between physical and mental pain, and how can you ease both? Revealing how your experiences of love, loss and pain are deeply intertwined, neuroscientist Yoram Yovell sheds light on the surprising role of your brain's endorphins and opioid receptors to ease physical and emotional suffering — and shows how this connection could pave the way to new treatments for mental health and well-being. https://www.ted.com/talks/yoram_yovell_why_broken_hearts_hurt_and_what_heals_them?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:132054 132054 Fri, 07 Jun 2024 14:44:35 +0000高等教育不00:12:02泰德
如何善用风险投资|弗雷达·卡普尔·克莱因弗雷达·卡普尔·克莱因Freada Kapor Klein isn't your typical venture capitalist. She's thrown out the standard investment playbook in order to close the opportunity gap for low-income communities. She explains how her firm is investing in entrepreneurs and startups solving real-world problems — and the measurable difference it's already making.如何善用风险投资|弗雷达·卡普尔·克莱因Freada Kapor Klein isn't your typical venture capitalist. 零食从农场到嘴里的旅程 |阿鲁纳·兰加查尔·波尔阿鲁纳·兰加查尔·波尔How does a biscuit make it from the farm to your plate? Sustainable development leader Aruna Rangachar Pohl unpacks the long journey of one of India's most beloved snacks, revealing how the current industrial farming model is eating the planet. Learn about the foundation she started to promote eco-friendly agricultural practices — and hear the success stories of small-scale farmers adopting natural practices to cook up a tasty, healthy and climate-resilient future for everyone.零食从农场到嘴里的旅程 |阿鲁纳·兰加查尔·波尔How does a biscuit make it from the farm to your plate? Sustainable development leader Aruna Rangachar Pohl unpacks the long journey of one of India's most beloved snacks, revealing how the current industrial farming model is eating the planet. Learn about the foundation she started to promote eco-friendly agricultural practices — and hear the success stories of small-scale farmers adopting natural practices to cook up a tasty, healthy and climate-resilient future for everyone. https://www.ted.com/talks/aruna_rangachar_pohl_a_snack_s_journey_from_the_farm_to_your_mouth?rss en.video.talk.ted.com:130929 130929 Wed, 05 Jun 2024 14:35:33 +0000高等教育不00:14:30泰德
